content: the rustic sunflower pot holder is part of the rustic sunflower kitchen series - a 3 pattern set of free patterns on my blog this pot holder works up quickly and easily in seamless single_crochet rounds with two rounds of sunflower petals added at the end double thickness for the center of the sunflower makes this pot holder durable and functional video tutorials are provided for how to make the perfect single_crochet center as well as the sunflower petals although sunflowers are my favorite these pot holders would look fabulous in other color combinations as well link to purchase ad-free pdf https //nanascraftyhome com/product/rustic-sunflower-towel-topper-coaster-potholder-crochet-patterns-ad-free-pdf/
